duties_responsibilities.duty: Champion business and functional requirements throughout all project phases.
Partner with project manager, business stakeholders, and IT staff for project support.
Play a key role in requirements definition, testing, training, and documentation.
Utilize both Waterfall and Agile SDLC methodologies.
Participate in multiple projects, priorities, and deadlines.
Lead productive group meetings in-person and via remote collaboration tools.
Work independently to deliver job accountabilities.
Experience in process development and implementation.
Healthcare experience, particularly in PBM exposure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Analysis, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
